40975.summary: Customers in Vernon are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
